description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Total Monarchy puts you in the role of a king competing to build the most successful empire. Players maneuver to collect the most treasure with strategic castle placement and attack enemies with deadly hazards. Outsmart your opponents in this strategy game that takes a minute to learn and a lifetime to master. Total Monarchy is addictive fun for the entire family!
